data.title: Olga Kurylenko Body Measurements, Height, Weight, Age
data.meta_description: You can check Olga Kurylenko Body Measurements including her height and weight. We are also sharing her relationship history and much more.
data.text:
Olga Kurylenko is a model cum actress who won the hearts of millions of fans from all across the world. She started her journey as a model and posed for various brands. Later she stepped into the acting industry and won many awards for her acting skills. Olga Kurylenko has a perfect body and that is the reason we are sharing Olga Kurylenko body measurements including her height in feet and weight in kg. So, check the below side and find the complete details of this famous model turn-actress.

Born on November 14, 1979, in Berdyansk, Ukraine, Olga Kurylenko began her career as a model before transitioning seamlessly into the world of acting. Her radiant beauty and undeniable charisma quickly propelled her to the forefront of the fashion industry, gracing the covers of renowned magazines and walking the runways of Paris and Milan. Olga Kurylenko was born to Marina Alyabuseva and Konstaintin Kurylenko. This Ukrainian-French model and actress remains low and talks less about her family. That is the reason there is limited information regarding her family.

Olga Kurylenko Body Measurements, Height, Weight, Age Husband

Height 5.9 feet Weight 53 kg Hair color Dark Brown Eye Color Green Date of Birth November 15, 1979

Olga Kurylenko Height in Feet:

This model turned actress has a long height and skinny body. Olga Kurylenko is 5.9 feet tall and has perfect body measurements according to her height.

Olga Kurylenko Weight:

She has a skinny body type and weighs around 53kg. Like her perfect height, Olga Kurylenko has perfect weight too. She looks stunning in her perfect body type.

Age and Date of Birth:

Olga Kurylenko was born on November 15, 1979. Currently, she is 44 years old and going to turn 45 years in 2024.

Olga Kurylenko Husband:

She has an interest in both men and women and that is the reason she tied the knot to French fashion designer Cedric Van Mol in 2000. Later they divorced in 2004 and She started dating to American mobile phone entrepreneur Damian Gabrielle and tied the knot in 2006. They were divorced in 2007 right after one year of their marriage. After that, she started dating to English actor Max Benitz and the couple have a son together.
